comment.author: 10799299@N00
comment._content: When I saw Nemours I thought this must have something to do with DuPont and Delaware. According to this old book on trapshooting the Nemours Gun Club was the first women's trapshooting club in the United States, founded in Wilmington, Delaware in 1913.

comment.author: 10799299@N00
comment._content: Here's an article from the DuPont Magazine about the club digital.hagley.org/cdm4/document.php?CISOROOT=/p15017coll... It's on page 29 (I don't think you can link directly to the page)
